title: "Report: Nordic Large Companies Trust Service Providers in AI Compliance"
excerpt: "According to a recent study, as many as 74 percent of large Nordic companies and organizations have strong confidence in service providers' knowledge of AI legislation. The survey was commissioned by SAS Institute, an American multinational software company."
